pkgmetadata.longdescription: Model-Averaged Tail Area (MATA) Confidence Interval and Distribution // Calculates Model-Averaged Tail Area Wald (MATA- Wald) confidence intervals, and MATA-Wald confidence densities and distributions, which are constructed using single-model frequentist estimators and model weights. See Turek and Fletcher (2012) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2012.03.002 and Fletcher et al (2019) doi:10.1007/s10651-019-00432-5 for details.
